= 02/06/2020 =
== vimwiki plugin setup ==
=== highlight headers in vimwiki colors ===
{{{class="brush: vim"
let g:vimwiki_hl_headers = 1
}}}

=== highlight checkboxes ===
{{{class="brush: vim"
let g:vimwiki_hl_cb_checked = 1
}}}

=== set up vimwiki path ===
{{{class="brush: vim"
let wiki = {}
let wiki.path = '~/vimwiki'

let g:vimwiki_list = [wiki]
}}}

=== nested syntax ===
{{{class="brush: vim"
let wiki = {}
let wiki.nested_syntaxes = {'python': 'python',
                         \  'bash': 'sh', 'sh': 'sh',
                         \  'vim': 'vim',
                         \  'git': 'git', 'gitconfig': 'gitconfig',}

let g:vimwiki_list = [wiki]
}}}

=== convert spaces in links to underscore ===
{{{class="brush: vim"
let wiki = {}
let wiki.links_space_char = '_'

let g:vimwiki_list = [wiki]
}}}

=== diary setup ===
{{{class="brush: vim"
let wiki = {}
let wiki.diary_caption_level = 3
let wiki.auto_diary_index = 1

let g:vimwiki_list = [wiki]
}}}

=== autogenerate table of contents upon save ===
{{{class="brush: vim"
let wiki = {}
let wiki.auto_toc = 1

let g:vimwiki_list = [wiki]
}}}
